charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0100_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Can I ask you a favor?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_0300_1: Well, there’s something that’s bothering me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_0500_1: Yeah, there’s something that’s bothering me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0600_1:
Apparently, my face gets really angry
whenever I battle.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0700_1:
And sometimes—just sometimes!—the
other Trainer and their Pokémon get
a little scared of me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_0900_1: So, let’s try this out. Look close!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_1100_1: OK, let’s try this out. Look close!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_1300_1:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Was my face a little off-putting?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_1500_1:
You don’t have to say it... I get it.
But it’s a habit, you know?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_1600_1:
It’s not something I can just stop doing
that easily!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_1900_1:
But if that’s the case, I wonder what those
Trainers and Pokémon were so scared of...
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2000_1:
Then again, I don’t think putting on your game
face during a battle is necessarily a bad thing.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2100_1:
You have to get serious during battles,
or you’ll lose.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2300_1: I have a lot riding on my battles.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2400_1:
I know Tepig understands that as we’re
battling together.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2500_1:
The relationship between Trainers and their
Pokémon is hard to define.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2600_1:
Arguably, the one and only thing that defines our
relationship with our Pokémon is their Poké Ball.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2700_1: It can seem one-sided and fickle.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_2900_1:
I know. I don’t think our relationship with our
Pokémon is as cold as that, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_3100_1:
I know. I don’t think our relationship with our
Pokémon is as cold as that, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3200_1:
But I remembered these guys
who called themselves Team Plasma
back in the Unova region.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3300_1:
They would make a fuss about how we should
liberate the Pokémon from their Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3400_1:
I guess they saw it as us enslaving the Pokémon
using Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3500_1:
So if we were able to form a bond so strong
that neither Trainers nor Pokémon would be
bothered by the Poké Balls...
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3600_1:
Maybe if we could do that, we wouldn’t 
have blockheads like them jumping to 
the wrong conclusion.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_3800_1:
All in all, Trainers and Pokémon have their own
wants, desires, and goals.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0302_3900_1:
That’d be a big undertaking...
wouldn’t it?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_4000_1:
All in all, Trainers and Pokémon have their own
wants, desires, and goals.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4100_1:
As long as they overlap and coincide, that means
the two of you are strongly connected.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4200_1:
And if that’s the case, you can work together
whether or not there’s a Poké Ball, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4300_1:
So I sat down and got to thinking about 
what makes a really strong bond.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4400_1:
I like Pokémon battles, and 
Tepig likes Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4500_1:
That’s why we don’t want to lose—and why we
try our darndest to make sure we win.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4600_1: Wouldn’t you say that’s a strong connection?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4700_1:
If we’re that in sync, that should mean that we
both want to win the PML the same way, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4800_1:
I’m sure that Tepig would choose the right move
even if I didn’t give the instruction!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4900_1:
Right, Tepig? If you were to use a move right
this moment, you’d choose Flame Charge, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_5100_1: I know, right?! I’m so glad we’re partners.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_5300_1: I know, right?! I’m so glad we’re partners.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5400_1:
I bet seeing how in sync we are makes you
even more excited to battle with us, huh!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5500_1:
I would know—because I’m really excited to
battle you, too!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5600_1:
You and your Pokémon are of the same mind,
just like Tepig and me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5700_1: I couldn’t ask for a better opponent!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5800_1:
So when we do battle, show me just how
synchronized you and your Pokémon are!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0100_1:
People always tell me they know what I’m
thinking just by looking at my face.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0200_1:
That’s true. I bet I can totally guess what you’re 
thinking right now.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0300_1: I’m not really one to talk, though.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0400_1:
I’m not very good at like, trying to outwit
somebody with tricky moves in battle, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0500_1:
I just go straight at my opponent when it comes
time for a Pokémon battle! Everything works out if
you just push through as hard as you can!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0101_0100_1:
Let’s see how hot the two of us can make
a Pokémon battle get!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0101_0200_1:
OK! But do you really think you can stop us?
I’m really driven to win!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0100_1:
Oof, you and Tepig ran right over us. That was
about as hot as a battle can get!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0200_1:
You and Torkoal were pretty awesome, too!
I thought you had us there.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0300_1:
I think both of us being easy to read is just proof
of how passionate we are about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0400_1:
You know, maybe you’re right! We shouldn’t be
embarrassed—we should be proud!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0600_1:
Oh, you’re evolving! All right! Now you can
grow even more!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0100_1:
Hello there, Hilda! Looks like you’ve been working
hard, huh?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0200_1:
Yup! We met all kinds of Trainers and battled
them all. Now Pignite and I are so much stronger!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0300_1:
Oh, well, if that’s the case, then perhaps we
should see who’s the strongest between us.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0400_1: You got it! I’m giving this one everything I’ve got!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0101_0100_1:
Everything I’ve seen on my adventures, everything
I’ve felt—I’m putting it all into winning this battle!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0101_0200_1:
That’s what I like to hear! I want to see you really
break out of your shell and go for it!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0100_1:
Now I see... You’re as strong as—no, even
stronger than I’d heard.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0200_1:
And it’s not just about raw power. The trust you
and Pignite have in each other is precisely why
you’re able to perform so well.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0300_1:
Yeah! We’ve been through so much together,
after all.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0400_1:
Well, you got me. I’m looking forward to seeing
just how strong you two can get.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0600_1:
Cheren did say we should break out of our shell.
I guess this is one way to do it!
